name: Pandamonium (GipMedia)
description:
Made for Brackeys Game Jam 2021.2 with theme "Let There Be Chaos!"

When I first heard the theme, I thought about the word chaos' meaning. Then, I realized the word Pandemonium was a synonym! I immediately wanted to make a game about a panda, and the theme of balance came to mind. As for where the main time-slowing mechanic came from, the movie Kung Fu Panda 2 was the primary inspiration behind it's execution - where you can catch incoming projectiles and throw them back. I then decided to make the game about conservation, though I wasn't able to include all of the references to the theme that I had hoped. 

Hope you enjoy!
